content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling eastbound on heil ave from goldenwest, taking my kids to the regency theater on the corner of beach and warner when i could see this strange object in the sky with very bright lights.  i could not discern its shape, but it had two red lights and a green light, all three very, very bright.  they were not like the little lights on the wings of a plane.  the object was stationary in the sky, hovering, and the two red lights were flashing in a sequence, as if an on/off button turning them on and off.  the green light stayed on without blinking or flashing and was very, very bright.  as i was driving i had my son partially film it but it came out poorly since we were in motion.  as we came to beach and made a right turn, there was a building obstructing our view.  when we rounded the corner and could eventually see the sky, the object was gone.  i don't know what path it took and could not see it anywhere.  

however, i must disclose that i immediately noticed this object in the sky because i saw an object that greatly resembled the one i saw tonight about three weeks ago.  i left my house at about 8:30 p.M. to go to cvs on beach blvd, and i was traveling southbound on edwards toward heil when i noticed a large craft exhibiting these same bright lights; however, it had a single red, white, and green light.  the green light was in the center, and all three lights were very bright.  the green light in the center was much larger and brighter than the red and white light, although they were very bright as well.  they did not blink or strobe or anything to that effect.  the craft itself was large, larger than an airplane, but i could not make out its shape.  it did not hover but was flying north in a direct path much lower than airplanes would.  the lights on this object were of equal size and intensity as the object i saw tonight, except that there was no blinking on this particular night.
content.summary: I saw the object nw of the intersection of warner and beach.  i saw that it had 3 very bright lights:  two red and one green.  the red lights were very bright and were flashing.  they were not blinking but were sequential w/ bright a steady green light

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside smoking tonight.  as i usually do, i looked up to the sky and happened to notice a very fast moving object in the sky moving south to north.  i initially thought it was a satellite, but it was moving entirely too fast for that.  for a second i thought it might be a meteor, but it gave off a red hue and in the same second i had this thought, it changed direction.  it didn't change direction sharply, however, it made s curves through the sky.

i'd never seen anything like this before and as a 34 year old night owl, an outdoor smoker, someone fascinated by stars, the moon, aircraft, and satellites, i've seen a lot over the years, but i have no frame of reference for this and its speed and direction change defies all human boundaries of flight.

i eventually lost sight of the object as it continued on its northern flight path to the more well lit indianapolis downtown sky.
content.summary: Ufo over greenwood/indy

content.detailedDescription: While going on an evening run with my daughter we stargazed as usual and i noticed two red craft flying in very close proximity to each other. being a former special forces operator in the marine corp i've seen many aircraft and these two caught my attention because they appeared to be flying in formation and there were no pulsating beacon lights. just a constant red light on both, which is extremely unusual due to the long beach airport being so close. we stopped running and began to walk as we watched these craft. the two craft in the front eventually faded to black before reaching the pier as they travelled southbound along the shoreline. the third craft behind them was the most peculiar as it abruptly accelerated for 1-2 seconds, banked hard west, slowed down and also faded to black. the fourth object faded to black soon after.
content.summary: Two red orbs flying side by side, traveling soutbound along the coast of long beach. followed by two others one behind the other.  lead orbs faded to black, third orb accelerated quickly , slowed down and turned then faded to black. final orb fades .

content.detailedDescription: Coyotes were going crazy howling in the back field, so i opened my back door to see how close they were, to my amaze they were closer than normal. i sat out on the back deck to listen for a moment when i noticed a larger than normal object in the clear night sky!  the object was a red glowing sphere traviling nw as a somewhat steady speed. i grabbed my lenses to get a closer look, and to my surprise it was defiantly not a plane!! i called my wife out to take a look, and she was instantly stunned, she took a look through the binoculars and was shaken up with what she saw. i didn't have to say anything to her, she new what she saw and went back into the house startled . i remained outside until the object was out of sight steadily flying over the back mountain side into the night sky. this is the first time i am reporting anything i have seen out on the country side, this is not the only occurance of strange objects i have seen out here. there has been more and more occurances in the past 6 months that i can't explain! luckily i know i'm not the only one seeing these things, we have had multiple witnesses, and i have photos of a landing with time, date, and gps coordinates that happened back in july. i just thought its time to quit keeping all this to myself and share what has been occurring in the sky's over tennessee!
content.summary: Large red pulsating object flying nw on a clear night.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east on i-96 at about 5:30 pm. i was around mile 128. i noticed the object stationary in the sky approximately 2 miles ahead of my car. it was not extremely high. i would guess it was less than 500 feet up. it was overcast, but bright out. i saw three bright lights in a row. they were in a line parallel to the horizon. the third light was the brightest. the first and second lights were very slightly farther apart than the second and third lights. i thought it was very odd that the object was stationary. i had a clear view of it, so i knew that it wasn't a light on a tower or anything. i also thought that the lights must have been very bright, considering my distance from them, and the fact that it was daylight out. i eventually rounded a bend on the expressway and lost sight of it behind trees. i was very sad to lose sight of it, because i had been very excited to see it. i couldn't stop staring as long as it was in view, which was very distracting to my driving. after i got home, i tried to see if there had been any similar sightings reported online. i found out that there have been many in the past month in my area, as well as a year ago.  there was also a very similar sighting in australia yesterday.
content.summary: 3 bright lights in a row.  parallel to horizon. third light brightest. slightly less distance between 2nd and 3rd light.

content.detailedDescription: At about 3:50 pm on feb. 09,i observed an oblong, cylinder shaped object moving slowly from the nne to the ssw. i at first believed it was a passenger jet as the local airport is nearby and the area occupied by the object is frequently used by approaching planes.Exiting the us127 n. highway onto the i-69 w. interchange ramp i pulled over to observe the object as something appeared "wrong" with what i was seeing.The object appeared about as large as say a dc-9 jet, but upon further observation i discovered the object displayed no wings nor did it have a vertical tail section.The object was a brilliant, "clean" white with no apparent projections from its body.It moved more slowly than what is typically seen from planes approaching the local airport for landing.It flew in an apparent straight line with no visible or apparent altitude changes.After watching it for a few minutes the crafts' aspect began to narrow as it apparently maneuvered to a more westerly path.As the object turned to where it would be seen only from behind, it could no longer be seen-it just disappeared.To confirm my own suspicions, i drove several miles west down i-69 to attempt to regain visual contact with the object but never saw it again.I believe it was originally flying slowly enough that i could have regained visual contact with it, assuming it maintained a similar speed and made no radical course changes.Interestingly, i don't think any of the other motorists driving by that day noticed anything strange about the object.
content.summary: Observed a cylinder/cigar shaped object that had no wings or vertical tail.No lights were seen.Object flew slowly and veered to the west/north west and could no longer be seen.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog at 5 pm on a neighborhood street when i impulsively turned around to look at the sky behind me. immediately there, in the same area that i have seen other unexplainable things previously reported, i saw a bright yellow oval shaped star traveling  level and steady for 5 seconds until it was behind a cloud. i kept looking for it to emerge, but it didn't.
i had enough time to assess- not a plane, not a star, not a shooting star. a few hours later, the local military base had a searchlight doing a 45 degree back and forth pattern not directed at the area of my sighting. i have never seen the base use a searchlight before.
content.summary: Large oval shaped star traveled behind cloud, did not emerge

content.detailedDescription:
Was working outside when aircraft flew over pretty low and made uturn. when i looked up the sky was full of small very bright white lights. thought they were just stars at first but noticed they were moving to the northwest at a steady speed. the aircraft after making the uturn went straight toward one of the lights. could see the red light on the plane as it headed for the white light. it looked like the red light ran into the white light and they both disappeared. there were clouds to my south which was the direction of the aircraft. possibl the aircraft disappeared behind the clounds. from my point of view the lights were about 5 miles wide but i could not determine the height. after about five minutes of viewing i could see maybe 3-5 aircraft lights which seemed to be about the same height of the white spheres. some of the white lights were in small clusters and others made a zig zag like formation. i watched this event for over 30 minutes. the lights just kept a steady nothwest motion.
i have watched the heavens for years. been at sea at night with no light. i have never seen anything like this. watching these small white lights gave me an uneasy feeling.
after watching for about 30 minutes i told myself those were just stars and you are just tired from a long day at work. i would just forget about all of this but the plane flying overhead doing an 180 and intersecting the white light was just strange.
content.summary: Was working ouside saw military aircraft come by, make uturn towards white light, looked like they intersected and both disappeared behind clouds to my south

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the backyard putting some things away before bed. i saw the first object fly in from the south-east to north. it maneuvered in arcs, constantly changing color and pulsating. i could not make out any strobe, beacon or navigation lights. it gained altitude, hovered for several minutes and disappeared. i looked back to the south,and another identical object flew in on the same course. i called my wife, who brought her ipad to record video. the second object behaved the same as the first, maneuvering in arcs, pulsating lights, a gain in altitude, then disappearing. after the second object vanished, a third came and did the same as the first two. the video is of the third object.
i am a faa certified, instrument-rated pilot with currency privelages. i am confident this was no airplane, helicopter, glider, balloon or remote-controlled vehicle.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Three of these objects in sequential order. one would disappear before another would appear.

content.detailedDescription: Uso follow up when i was living in the chesapeake... i feel like stuff moves through my head but it really is about ... natural mariner rope pulls accross the sea creating naural coral and barnacle with a fullerene woven aerator driven system, since we have to pay for air for a while, similar to above ground chairlift systems.  however, this will be a of load on load system that current technology exists.  the body of the neumatic system will be able to create reef habitat while transporting railcar good over seas for just in time arrival.  natural renewable methods are best employed with two to twenty year retirement with the electric belt driven system.  the ecological benefits will increase reef habitat as well protect on a erosional basis.  smaller versions of the weave with geodesic structure could assist in fresh water situations as well.  i keep saying the midway atoll would be a great proving ground for this ecological wonder.
content.summary: Underwater sea object  early morning had a call from maybe langley?  last name?  problem solved?  where protest industrial hemp?

content.detailedDescription: the discs were those of the ford motor co.  the majestic 12 of the ford motor co is looking again at the kenneth arnold.  the kenneth arnold tower is available.
content.summary: the discs were the ford motor co discs.  we are in seattle.

content.detailedDescription: Friend notice approach, dip down and rise, hovering.  his wife and i joined saw hovering triangles making patterns of circle, u, v, and aligned in two rows, the circle shape chaned from tight to loose formation.  the they aligned in two rows and floated west.  wind blowing from nw.  there was no wing flapping, no sound, no physical effects.  no reflection of any light.  would have appeared as birds to the casual glances.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 7 black triangles forming patterns while stationary, approached, dropped down, rose up, hovered making patterns, aligned and changed direction leaving slowly and silently,

content.detailedDescription:
I was working security for the airport on a midnight to 8 am shift on a thursday in october, i believe the year was 1986.  i was parked in the company jeep with an authorized dog with me, behind a chain link fence on plane parking/storage area just west of the flightline.  my dog alerted to some incoming air traffic, by a low growl and his hackles went up big time.  i heard what sounded like an aircraft of some sort but like nothing i have ever heard before, and realized a big black shadow whose silhouette looked exactly like a b2 stealth from underneath approached at just above large treetop level, which i would estimate about 35-40 feet above my vehicle.  this "craft" hovered over my vehicle for approximately 30 to 60 seconds (hard to remember exactly as i was shocked) and then continued to the west and if it continued in a straight path, would have been towards ny city.  

a word about night time aircraft traffic at gabreski airport:  there are two sides to this airport.  to the south was the 106th ny air guard base, where  my then husband and several other military personnel worked.  that side of the base was strictly air guard and there were c130 planes and other smaller planes on the tarmac and in hangars there.  i know what a c130 sounds like and i have been inside one as well. i have watched them take off and run maneuvers and also land.  this craft i saw was not a c130 or similar plane.

to the north was the public airport meaning privately owned non-military operated planes were kept, flown from and to, the public side of gabreski airport. part of my job was to take down the tail number of the plane when it lands and to observe the goings on of the occupants.  this was done to deter drug activity/delivery/drops and if necessary the local law enforcement was summoned.

the air traffic control tower was closed after 10 pm.  it was common policy for any planes landing at night to click their radio mike 10 times in succession to activate the blue landing lights for safety.  this craft i observed did not activate any lights, nor did it attempt to land,  

another thing of note is that grumman was not far away, it was one town north located in calverton, ny (near riverhead,ny).  it would not have been unusual, i would think, for them to perform test runs on newly built craft, especially at night where it would not interfere with day air traffic or ops.  

it has been so long now that i don't recall directly notifying the on duty security police of the ny air guard, but i did tell my then-husband about it and he relayed the info to other security police.  i had not heard any other sightings related to this incident via the news on tv or the newspapers, or word of mouth.  i have been in law enforcement ever since then right up until my retirement from law enforcement last august and i have never seen anything like this.  the only thing that makes any sense to me is it was a high security secretive mission on a prototype craft because i never saw one again.  i do not know if it was manned, or a drone, but i do know i did not see any lights from a cockpit.  the only lights i saw were some very large dimmed red almost a soft lighting that was constant from the underside of each wing.  this light seemed to just emit a soft glow and did not light up the ground in any way.
content.summary: Parked at airport on security patrol. hovering craft observed overhead. dog alerted first.

content.detailedDescription: It was sunday night approximately 11:00 i went outside the backyard to let my dogs in and i noticed towards the southwestern sky very bright objects one large and one small the smallest one disappeared quickly it was kind of yellowish the large one is very bright orange color diamond shaped no sound it was drifting towards the southwest and then west towards the city of rosenberg texas i also noticed before it turn west a dole gray object descended to the ground it floated like leaf the weather outside stafford texas was very foggy night this is the first time i've ever witnessed a thing so unusual thank you sincerely luis aguilar 2/11/13 1 am
content.summary: Two ufos very bright one large one small or large one looked like a diamond the smaller one yellowishand disappeared quickly no sound

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i saw this atleast 3 or 4 times in the last week. i have been involved with setilive, tracking e.T's ... there is alot of activity going on around us. my description of this u.F.O is that is was moving really slow, and it had lights all over it, and they flashed in sequence, like a police light.It was triangle shaped. it's quite crazy, we've seen quite alot occur since i've gotten more into seti and stuff. maybe they're trying to make contact?, i don't know. unfortunatley, i have no media to present.
content.summary: My wife and i saw this 3 or 4 times.

content.detailedDescription: Watching matlock around 7:30pm feb 9th 2013 sat, father yelled as i ran out with video cam in hand ufo was hovering above the house as the lights turned red to green and white to blue yellow-orange moving north to south. 5 mins later a black helicopter with a searchlight came from west to north, 30 secs later two jets past from east moving to the north.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 witness  a  ufo  hovering over our house , i  got video and a photo of  the ufo.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside on our porch to have a cigarette around 10 pm and it was a very clear night. i looked up and this star looked odd and out of place it was very bright, brighter than anything else in the sky and it seemed to sparkle and pulse. i watched it for a minute or so and called my wife outside to show her she to thought it was odd looking and said you should get your camera. that was easy (i do ebay so my camera was already on my tripod). the object was still there i took about 30 pictures. i went inside after a while and turned my pc on so i could transfer the photo's. after about 20 minutes i went back outside and it was still there no change. went inside and returned after about 20 minutes and it was gone.
content.summary: Brightist obect in sky at first thought was northstar but it wasn't looked differnt than anything else stars etc.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside on our porch to have a cigarette around 10 pm and it was a very clear night. i looked up and this star looked odd and out of place it was very bright, brighter than anything else in the sky and it seemed to sparkle and pulse. i watched it for a minute or so and called my wife outside to show her she to thought it was odd looking and said you should get your camera. that was easy (i do ebay so my camera was already on my tripod). the object was still there i took about 30 pictures. i went inside after a while and turned my pc on so i could transfer the photo's. after about 20 minutes i went back outside and it was still there no change. went inside and returned after about 20 minutes and it was gone.
content.summary: Brightist obect in sky at first thought was northstar but it wasn't looked differnt than anything else stars etc.

content.detailedDescription: 2 of us were sitting on the back deck lest night when we saw an orange light that we thought at first was an airplane. but, as if flew over it just seemed more like a high altitude rocket. we could see flames shooting out the back of it. the object and the flames were both orange and bright. and, it moved in a straight path from north to south. it seemed pretty high in the sky, but much slower than meteors i've seen. we are both just trying to see how many people saw it. and, we'd love to know what it was.
content.summary: Orange teardrop shaped object with flames seen moving slowly over night sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving the public library when i noticed that the crepe myrtle bushes looked interesting under the parking lot lights. photography is one of my hobbies. i have a habit of carrying my camera with me all the time. it was a very cold night. the temp was hovering around freezing. there was a possibility of sleet in the area, but this passed by. 
i got in my car and turned the heater on to warm up. i rolled down the driver's side window and pulled closer to the bushes. i'm still a novice with photography. it takes me a bit to experiment with manual camera settings to get the look that i want, especially with night time photography.
i took about five shots of two different crepe myrtle bushes. i noticed nothing unusual. it was a very quiet night with very little traffic. i think most people were staying in because of the threat of ice. i heard no noise from airplanes. there was scattered cloud cover and stars visible through the clouds. i toyed with the idea of setting up my tripod to get some shots of the night sky, but it was just too cold. 
a couple of days later i opened the photographs on my pc to edit them. i noticed the three lights immediately. the mist and orbs in the right side of the pic are probably due to my cars engine. the three lights do seem to be up in the sky and not an odd reflection on the lens. the lights seem to illuminate the hazy cloud around them. only one of the five pictures have the lights. i would be inclined to think that this was an airplane except for the low altitude and the lack of engine noise. 
explanations are most welcome.
the first attached photo is the original shot converted to jpeg format. in the second photo i have increased the contrast and the brightness.
content.summary: Discovered possible anomalous lights on photograph. did not notice anything unusual when the pic was taken.

content.detailedDescription: I decided to photograph jet vapour trails with the moon between, after viewing the picture i noticed the object. the photo was taken outside and no visable reflective surfaces near.
content.summary: Photgraphed vapour trails with moon after noticed object behind the vapour trail

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette, i looked to the east then i saw a large orange/reddish starlike object rise straight up above the tree line as if it was taking off into the air. (maybe 10 miles away) once it rose to a certain distance, another one followed behind it. when those two rose to a distance they became just a reddish color, then they began traveling west, another one (3rd) rose from the tree line, rising straight up then following the two proceeding ones.I was just watching in shock thinking i wish i had my camera.When the first one had passed overhead at a far distance, the 2nd one wasn't too far behind.I watched them both head west toward orion, then they disappeared completely, when they should have been somewhat visible.I saw the 4th one rise from behind the tree line (like the 3 before them) it was also an orange/reddish color, almost glowing with it until getting to a certain distance into the atmosphere, im not sure? they just became a red color once they started traveling west.While i watched all 4 of them rise, i didn't notice a sound around me at all. but it was when the 4th one rose that i ran into my house to get my phone to film them.When i came back out the 3rd one was already disappearing into thin air as it got closer to the orion constellation as well. the video i took of the 4th one, it is in the middle of the screen for the most part. it a red dot but it's visible.At some points it disappears, but shows back up. there are some street lights in the video as well, but its taken of the 4th one as it starts heading west, above and then as far west as i could see it on the camera screen.
content.summary: Four starlike objects rose one after another from behind eastern tree lined horizon, then rose straight up into air, then traveled west.

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside about 3:30 when i noticed a white disc shape emerge from a cloud and fly south.  six miles then disaster 
no
content.summary: Object came out of a cloud themoved east about six mile then disappeared into thin air

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on february 4, 2013 at approximately 7:15pm on i10 and dezavala road in san antonio, texas when another witness in the backseat of my car observed round orange/yellow orbs of light, approximately 40 blinking off and on randomly. all the lights together making a diamond shape in the sky approximately one and a half football fields in length. i know this because we also observed a small plane underneath it and two small planes beside it as the orbs of light were turning off/on randomly. the third witness on passenger side also observed the lights in disbelief. at first i thought something was falling from the sky, then i noticed the lights were hovering above. we attempted to film this ufo with our phones, but after several attempts, we were unable to film. as the orbs of light rapidly started to turn off, we were only able to get a small amount of pictures of these orbs.  the pictures do not do it justice. we only got the end of the disappearing orbs. the total time we observed this was approximately 40 seconds before it dissappeared before our eyes. i still don't know what this was, just that we don't understand it and we have never seen anything like this before.  if anyone knows of anything new going on with military experimenting with aircrafts that they have not yet told the citizens of us, i think it's time they fessed up. we need an explanation as to what we saw in the sky. i feel everyone has a right to know, that is why i am sharing my story. there were several cars driving by, there has to be other people who witnessed this phenomenon. 

p.S. after we viewed the pictures we also observed the lights were actually floating right above the parking lot right in front of us, although we didn't see them when we were actually there.....Super strange.
content.summary: Round orange/yellow orbs of light, approximately 40 blinking off and on, all together making a diamond shape in the sky approximately 1.5 football fields in length.

content.detailedDescription: Do not have time at this time. photos are on my phone at this time and not on my computer yet.
content.summary: One large crescent shaped object with four red orange lights or four red orange lights flying in perfect formation. lights never blinked like a airplane or helicopter.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 12:30 am i saw a starlike object ascend in the ne, beginning at 60 degrees above the horizon.  it reached approximately 80 degrees within two minutes.  at first i thought it might be an approaching jet, but it had no strobes and it maintained the same size, indicating that it was not coming closer or moving away.  it was only moving upwards.  it was beneath the cloud cover last night - which makes me think it may have been of similar size to conventional aircraft.  i base that on how planes usually look coming and going, as i live between o'hare and midway, and comparing the starlike object to regular air traffic luminosity.

i had time to observe the object through binoculars, though they're not very strong.  the object was pulsing and multi-colored.  i watched this for a minute or so, it was only hovering at this point.  it blinked out right then, and looked like a small white ember - just a pinpoint.  here's the weird part: when the object dimmed, a whitish meteor arced north from the object. as if the meteor came from it.  the object made no sound.  a plane with red strobes came from the direction of o'hare (west), toward the object and the object disappeared.  when the plane passed, the object became visible again, having moved about two inches right in a more easterly direction and now at about 85 degrees.

the cloud cover began to obscure it from my view and i went inside shortly after.
content.summary: Starlike object slowly ascending ne, faded and disappeared - primarily white but pearlescent

content.detailedDescription:
In the late afternoon of august 14, 2003  my wife, while i was driving slowly along a back road just north of the big park grade school in the village of oak creek of sedona arizona, began taking photographs of the sky to the west of the red rock mesas. my wife is an artist and wanted to use the monsoon cloud photos in her paintings. in two of the photos, taken within seconds of each other, a large bush can be seen where the craft was photographed. in the background is a distant mesa while in the sky, within an odd angular opening in the clouds, appears to be dark object beaming down two bright lights. one photo shows both a red and a bright white spot while in the other both spots are white.
of possible interest, is that we did not see the dark object or the lights at the time the photos were taken. they were only observed after the photographs were down-loaded into our computer. our camera is a kodak easy share cx6330.
upon the two photographs being down-loaded onto the computer the lights and dark object were observed and i magnified as well as enlarged the sections showing the craft (yes it is a small bubble type craft showing a single person operating what appears to be a vertical control system). also, i have added what is referred to as solar color to a number of the photographs to enhance the photos but other than being enlarged and solarized i did not change or add anything to them.
several days later i had some workmen working on our home and i happened to have the photos lying on the kitchen table. at the time i was talking to the construction foreman and upon his seeing the photos he asked where they had been taken. upon my telling him where they had been taken he said two of his men had also seen the craft while fixing a flat tire alongside the same road. he then had the men view the photos and they asked if they could have copies of the photos since their friends and families had laughed and ridiculed them when they told of their having seen the craft land on the red mesa shown in the background of the two photographs.
content.summary: Single ocupancy, round ufo - possibly ours? possibly others?

content.detailedDescription:
Case #44055
witness reported seeing small ufos as like on close encounters of the third kind.
they had multiple lights, no shape. lights remained stationary.
witness borrowed telescope that he and girlfriend used. they compared notes and
the same description of lights. now we have two witnesses.
disc shape with two tails in rear totally iridescent like mother of pearl.
saw one then as many as four. witness felt weird like watching close encounters of 
thethird kind. stated some are larger than others. said it was frightening.
size of a pin head and one was three times larger than the others. blue, red, green, and sometimes 
yellow. at times they were extremely bright.
one northern sky, one n.E. and two  east.
the time is usually between 7:30  8:00 pm
15  degrees and 20 degrees from horizon.
no sound and the weather was clear. witness did call 911.
later saw the same lights on cnn t.V.
witness is 60 years old. he was also hesitant and then not clear on telling me what his career
was. he finially said international transportation. he was out of the country when i first
tried to contact him. he may be a govt worker or flight attendant.
uav  mars was e.N.E. as well as jupiter and saturn being visible.
content.summary: Stationary lights of various colors

content.detailedDescription: After the blizzard of 2013 new england was hit pretty hard. if you lived in this are you would know that the storm converged right over our heads. the winds were wild and amazing in their force and frequency. after it was all said and done we emerge to shovel, plow, and digg our ways out of our homes. there was one amazing thing on that day, something i had not noticed before. those that live in the country would know exactly what i mean. it was quite. no car sounds, no distant truck, and most importantly no planes.  it is at this time that i stared at the sky as the clouds began to break, to my surprise there was this long chem trail in the air you know the stuff planes leave behind when they fly by. but remmber new england airports were sill closed because of the storm just less than 10 hours before. i now present the evidence and a question. what caused that and other chem trails that appeared over the skies on that day?
content.summary: Chemical trails in the air over new england.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my girlfriend were on trip to visit my parents in gloucester
(australia).
gloucester is full of little forests aroud it, where me and my girlfriend decided to spent the night with food and bonfire.
as we were eating and talking around the bonfire, a pulsing yet strong light, hitted the attention of my girlfriend who immediately reported my attention to it.
the object was approaching to land slowly and vertically; we then decided to run to see what was happening carrying a torch.
we started to walk with suspicion into the woods, and as we were more and more closer to the object, its form started to emerge.
it was a triangular craft, probably 9ft long an 6ft height entirely enveloped with aura-like pulsing lights, the color of aura would change dynamically from red to blue to black to white, with many shades.
the object was making no sound at all, and was without any landing gear; it was as if was in suspension, and it was full of static electricity.

after four minutes, my girlfriend was starting to be afraid of what she was looking at, yet (in my opinion) curious of the craft.
we started to have an argument about what we had to do.(either running to the police station to report the event, or staying there while traying to understand more of what was going on.)
meanwhile, the object started to lift-off at 2:14 am, with no sound, no air disturbance, nothing.
we started to retreat, as if we were perceiving a "threat".
the object was lifting up between the trees, slowly, yet with decision.
it stopped just above the trees, and... it's hard to find the words to describe it's velocity, but it was... probably instantaneous.
in short, the speed was just unknown.

during and after the event, our emotions were equal: wonder.
we were wondering what was the that glowing light landing between the trees; we were wondering and questioning ourselves fruitlessly.
even though we were just feets from this craft or whatever it was, we felt "hypnotized" by it.

ultimately, we went to my parent; waking them up out of the blue.
but... whomever we ever talked to, derision was the only result.
content.summary: a triangular craft, enveloped with aura and pulsing lights
